results.original_title: NARUTO ナルティメットヒーロー3 ついに激突! 上忍VS下忍!! 無差別大乱戦大会開催!!
results.overview: A contest is made by the Fifth Hokage called Jonin vs Genin. The point is to collect crystals for points, with the higher-ranked Chunin and Jonin holding crystals worth more points. The Genin have blue crystals, while the Chunin and Jonin have red crystals.
results.title: Finally a clash! Jōnin vs. Genin!! Indiscriminate Grand Melee Tournament Meeting!!

results.overview: Samuel Pierret is a nurse who saves the wrong guy – a thief whose henchmen take Samuel's pregnant wife hostage to force him to spring their boss from the hospital. A race through the subways and streets of Paris ensues, and the body count rises. Can Samuel evade the cops and the criminal underground and deliver his beloved to safety?
results.title: Point Blank

results.overview: Depicting minutes before and after a child is killed by a car.
results.title: To Kill a Child

results.overview: A man stabbed to death is haunted by his memories and fantasies while dying alone.
results.title: Death in the Afternoon

results.overview: When an aspiring dancer is dropped by her partner days before her big performance, she’ll need to teach a down-and-out boxer some moves to win the prize money and open her dream dance studio. But will their on-stage chemistry lead to some off-stage romance?
results.title: The Boxer and the Butterfly

results.original_title: Marvel Studios Assembled: The Making of Loki Season 2
results.overview: Through candid interviews with the creative minds behind the show, and exclusive on-set footage, discover how the talented team that powered "Loki: Season 2" raised the stakes for this latest MCU adventure. Witness imaginative costumes, elaborate environments, and far-out variants come to life, meet new allies and foes, and time-slip across the Multiverse.
results.title: Marvel Studios Assembled: The Making of Loki Season 2

results.original_title: Il y a longtemps que je t'aime
results.overview: A woman struggles to interact with her family and find her place in society after spending fifteen years in prison.
results.title: I've Loved You So Long

results.original_title: Maciste contre la reine des Amazones
results.overview: In medieval France, traveler Pygar tells he-man Karzan (Maciste in the French version) of his recent journey to a place called Antigua, and of its entire community of Amazons promising undreamed of sexual satisfaction to any man who comes upon them. More importantly, Pygar tells of a fortune in gold. Karzan/Maciste, is persuaded to undertake the journey in search of riches, unaware that Pygar is in collusion with the Amazon Queen to actually deliver Maciste as a slave stud to help rejuvenate the race.
results.title: The Lustful Amazons

results.original_title: Eason and The DUO Band L.O.V.E. is L.I.V.E.
results.overview: After going on the Duo tour from 2010 to 2012, Eason and the duo band gathered again in 2018 for their first album L.O.V.E. and even held the charity concert L.O.V.E. is L.I.V.E. During the concert, Eason performed hit singles and songs from their album, including "To Be Together," "Am I Me," "Tequila," "Long Live To Us," "All About Love" and "The Album." Besides concert clips, Duo Love also carries the 120-minute documentary L.O.V.E. in F.R.A.M.E.S. that records the highlights of the Duo tour and behind-the-scenes of their album recording.
results.title: Eason and The DUO Band L.O.V.E. is L.I.V.E.

results.overview: A high mountain hamlet, early summer. Félix comes down from the pastures where he’s guarding his cows and finds his old mother lying lifeless on her bed. Shaken, he runs off. He drives a few miles in the valley to the house of a young man who just contacted him on a dating app.
results.title: Fire at the Lake

results.overview: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con the famous magician.
results.title: Death Defying Acts

results.original_title: Chissà perché... capitano tutte a me
results.overview: Following the events of The Sheriff and the Satellite Kid, Sheriff Hall and H-725 (using the official identity of Charlie Warren) still get no rest from the military - because the little alien has not yet grasped the meaning of keeping a low profile. They are constantly on the move, and H-725's father has had to pick them out of a tight spot too many times already.
results.title: Why Did You Pick On Me?

results.original_title: Li Xiao Long di Sheng yu si
results.overview: This documentary tells the story of Bruce Lee and his unsuccessful efforts to start a acting career in the U.S., he returned to Hong Kong where he became an international star, and his death at age 32.
results.title: Bruce Lee: The Man and the Legend

results.overview: The aging Caesar finds himself intrigued by the young Egyptian queen. Adapted by George Bernard Shaw from his own play.
results.title: Caesar and Cleopatra

results.overview: Beautiful violin virtuoso Camille has two obsessions: the music of Ravel, and a friend of her husband's who crafts violins. But his heart seems to be as cold as her playing is passionate.
results.title: A Heart in Winter

results.overview: Sequel to Day of the Laborer. Roberto and his wife Beatriz work on a construction site, him as a laborer and her selling food. Another laborer El Chalan, seduces neighborhood maids in order to rob the homes  where they work. In the neighborhood there is also a serial killer on the loose who preys on prostitutes.
results.title: El día de los albañiles 2

results.overview: A global broadcast & digital special organized by Global Citizen and the World Health Organization featuring comedians, musicians, and actors to raise funds in support of front line health workers in the global response to COVID-19.
results.title: One World: Together at Home

results.original_title: Il senso della bellezza - Arte e scienza al CERN
results.overview: An exploration of the link between science and beauty through the work of scientists at CERN, in Geneva.
results.title: Cern and the Sense of Beauty

results.overview: The story of a student going about his daily life, and getting tired with the monotony.
results.title: ALL I NEED

results.overview: As Maddy takes on coaching a team of young twelve-year-old gymnasts, she faces up to intense city versus country rivalry, racism, cyberbullying and her own self-doubt but eventually takes the challenge head on.
results.title: A Second Chance: Rivals!
